pull.title: fuzz: compare scripts from `Expand` and `ExpandFromCache`
pull.body: When testing a descriptor, if it was able to `Expand`, `ExpandFromCache` should also work and scripts should be the same. This PR covers it in `TestDescriptor` for `descriptor_parse` fuzz.
